title: Voyeur Dead
description: Warning!If you are frightened easily, if you have night or day terrors, if you have a heart condition, think very carefully before you read or view the images in Voyeur Dead. You have been warned!Witness the end of the world though the eyes of a voyeur in this photographic journal of a sexual predator finding himself face to camera with the walking dead. Now predator is prey. The voyeur must look to his victims for salvation.
author: Alan Gandy
